message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SD, cs.HC, cs.SY, cs.MM 

The paper discusses a security vulnerability in smartphones and tablets, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The authors also evaluate the effectiveness of the attack in a real-world environment, which involves human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and mobile computing (cs.MM). The proposed solutions to block the attack involve hardware and operating-system mechanisms, which could fall under the categories of system design (cs.SD) and systems and control (cs.SY).
